name: Daily Cards: A Notion Template
description: Daily Cards to quickly view your day and /or week.This Notion Daily Cards template is an all-in-one solution for organizing your day and week effectively. With various database relations, you can track daily tasks, health goals, and journaling efficiently. The template includes a Daily and Weekly Cards database with rollups, formulas, and relations to display information from other databases. Additionally, you can use the Sleep Tracker, Exercise Tracker, Recipe Database, Meals Database, Library
features: Health Stats Database; Daily and Weekly Cards; Sleep Tracker; Exercise Tracker; Recipe Database; Meals Database; Library Database; Mood Tracker; Task Database; Birthdays  Database
